title: Untitled
text: Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see https://quarto.org.

title: Untitled
text:
Running Code
When you click the Render button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

1 + 1

[1] 2


You can add options to executable code like this


[1] 4


The echo: false option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).

title: About
text:
There are four main questions that we are trying to tackle with our current version of the dashboard:

How many ads are the Dutch political parties placing on the platforms that we look at?
How much money are the parties spending on each platform?
How many people are reached through these ads?
How are the political ads targeted towards individuals?


Disclaimer: the data shown in this dashboard is based on the platformâ€™s respective ad libraries. For this reason the data shown here might not reflect the full picture nor all political ads that were targeted at voters.

Visit politieke-advertenties.nl for more info (Website is in Dutch).





Want to see how political parties target you? Sign up with our partners at Who Targets Me and download the gratis browser plugin to see how parties on Facebook use your data:
https://whotargets.me/
